mapper.select: select A.iboard, A.title, A.iuser, A.regdt, A.thumbnail, B.favCnt, C.uid, C.unm from diaryDB A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT iboard, count(iboard) as favCnt FROM favDB GROUP BY iboard ) B ON A.iboard = B.iboard LEFT JOIN userDB C ON A.iuser = C.iuser ORDER BY B.favCnt DESC
